hero.title:
Privacy First.
Local Intelligence.
hero.subtitle: A collection of utility tools built with SwiftUI & CoreML.

apps.name: ShareGuard
apps.desc: Remove metadata before sharing photos. Protect your location privacy.
features: One-tap removal of GPS & device info

knowledge.title: The Digital Fingerprint
knowledge.content: Every digital photo carries hidden metadata known as Exif. It records not just aperture and shutter speed, but often your precise GPS coordinates. ShareGuard leverages the low-level ImageIO framework to surgically strip this invisible data without re-encoding pixels, ensuring your digital footprint remains yours alone.

apps.name: P2V Converter
apps.desc: Convert raster images (PNG/JPG) to Vector SVG instantly on device.

knowledge.title: Why Vector?
knowledge.content: Raster images are made of pixels and lose quality when scaled. Vectors are made of mathematical paths and remain sharp at any size. P2V uses computer vision algorithms to trace contrast edges in your images, converting static pixels into scalable geometry instantly.

apps.name: pcAI Photo Retouch
apps.desc: Local AI driven object removal and photo enhancement tools.

knowledge.title: On-Device Intelligence
knowledge.content: Most AI tools require uploading photos to a cloud server. pcAI runs entirely on your device's Neural Engine using CoreML. This means zero latency, zero privacy risk, and full functionality even when you are offline in the middle of nowhere.

apps.name: 3D Model Viewer
apps.desc: Import, view and convert OBJ, USDZ, STL files seamlessly.

knowledge.title: The Language of Geometry
knowledge.content: 3D files are essentially lists of vertices and faces. This app utilizes Apple's SceneKit and Metal APIs to render these complex geometries efficiently on mobile devices, bridging the gap between desktop modeling software and mobile visualization.

apps.name: CutoutCraft
apps.desc: Offline background removal powered by Apple CoreML.

knowledge.title: Semantic Segmentation
knowledge.content: How does the app know what is a person and what is background? It uses a technique called Semantic Segmentation. The CoreML model analyzes the image pixel by pixel, classifying them into different categories, allowing for precise separation of the subject from its surroundings.

apps.name: DXF Assistant
apps.desc: View CAD drawings on the go. Lightweight and fast.

knowledge.title: Vector Precision
knowledge.content: DXF (Drawing Exchange Format) is the industry standard for CAD data. Unlike raster images, DXF files contain precise mathematical vector data. This app parses these raw vectors and renders them using a custom 2D graphics engine for infinite zoom capability without quality loss.

apps.name: SheetCollector
apps.desc: Scan and organize physical documents into digital sheets.

knowledge.title: Computer Vision
knowledge.content: Transforming a physical paper into a flat digital image requires complex mathematics. The app uses the Vision framework to detect the four corners of a document in real-time, then applies a homographic transformation to rectify the perspective, making the scan look like it was flatbed-scanned.
